attributes.review: This app will literally stink up your whole house. I downloaded it then suddenly my entire house smelled of Cheetos, cheese, literally EVERYTHING ORANGE! I hate this app. I deleted it and suddenly the house smelled like lavender. Downloaded it again and I found MICE IN MY CABINET!😡🤬🤬🤬😡🤬🤬🤬! I will never be downloading this app again! HOPEFULLY IT GETS REMOVED!!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I’m not sure how this happened but when I downloaded this app it shut down my phone and I had to restart it. It kept doing it at least another three times. This app needs huge fixing to do
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: Literally looking at a cheese puff all day😌 is the day you get to work tomorrow at the school and I will let you know you wanna I was gonna I was like a was a good day and I wanna was a good day I hope you have a good day and I hope you have a good day and I’ll be happy to see you tomorrow
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app will brainwash you. It’s run by aliens who want to eat your brains, so they make ur brain mush by having u open the app. Then they can find the users of the app and eat ur brains! Don’t worry I didn’t let it get to me so no aliens will be eating my brains but stay safe and don’t download this app!
attributes.title: AWFUL AWFUL APP

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to keep track of Cheeto bois antics but that became a clear mistake when my phone began glitching like crazy. As if I didn’t hate the cheese puff enough already he just had to go and mess up my phone. The app is almost as dysfunctional as he is.
attributes.title: Glitchy

attributes.review: so many glitches. doesn’t even try to educate about real political issues, just forces you to pick a side without hearing what the other side has to say. No authentic discourse, that should not be the way. made me look down on Apple’s app store apps.
attributes.title: This app stinks

attributes.review: How do they expect big brother to watch us with such a poorly designed app?  Crashes immediately and constantly, brews hate and fear among the public, can’t even form coherent sentences...0/5 would not recommend to the American public.
attributes.title: They really tried

attributes.review: I downloaded to pay my respect for the Cheeto man but I outraged! Once I open the app my phone had glitches and I didn’t even know that the Cheeto man was going to be on my wallpaper!  I also saw the other day that he harass his daughter and he’s a narcissists that is low-minded
attributes.title: This app ain’t it 😶

attributes.review: I cannot express how much of a hard time this horrendous thing that trump claims is an ‘app’ gave me. I opened it up and saw a giant orange Cheeto waving. It almost gave me a heart attack, this is simply unacceptable imagine if someone with a heart problem saw that. This app should be removed from the App Store IMMEDIATELY!
attributes.title: This app was horrible

attributes.review: Bruh I downloaded this app for like .2 seconds when immediately it gave my phone a virus!!! That virus being a naked photo of trump that I couldn’t get off my phone! Eventually I had to burn my eyes out to get rid of the image and now my seeing eye dog is typing this review out for me so DONT GET THIS APP it’s terrible
attributes.title: THIS APP SUKS DOODOO
